tab.name: Class select
tab.about: Select the desired class from the options offered.

hoverMenu.name: Select class
hoverMenu.info: Click on one of the class names to start a draft. You can change the way classes are offered from the settings menu.

hoverMenu.name: Other screens
hoverMenu.info: Use the buttons at the top to open the About, Drop rates, Card list, Help or Settings screens.

tab.name: Card draft
tab.about: This screen allows you to simulate an arena draft.

hoverMenu.name: Selected class
hoverMenu.info: This is the selected class for the current draft.

hoverMenu.name: Offered cards
hoverMenu.info: Click on one of the three cards offered to add it to your deck.

hoverMenu.name: Drafted deck
hoverMenu.info: Drafted cards are added to your deck.

hoverMenu.name: Card count
hoverMenu.info: This shows how many cards have been added to the deck out of the total of 30.

hoverMenu.name: Copy to clipboard
hoverMenu.info: Click this button to copy the current draft to your clipboard.

hoverMenu.name: Tier scores
hoverMenu.info: Card tier scores are displayed underneath the cards.

hoverMenu.name: Help screen
hoverMenu.info: Click on this button to open the help screen.

hoverMenu.name: Start new draft
hoverMenu.info: Click one of these buttons to abandon the current draft and go back to the class select screen.

tab.name: Settings
tab.about: This screen allows you to change the draft type, whether or not card duplicates are allowed and how class selection behaves.

hoverMenu.name: Draft type
hoverMenu.info: Choose between regular draft and tier draft (where cards are sorted based on tier score instead of rarity).

hoverMenu.name: Duplicates
hoverMenu.info: No duplicates: a card will appear in a draft only once, Constructed: constructed rules apply (the draft can have up to two copies of the same common, rare or epic card, but only one copy of legendaries), Allow duplicates: a card will never be removed from the card pool no matter how many times it is drafted.

hoverMenu.name: Class selection
hoverMenu.info: Normal selection: you are offered a selection of three classes at random, Pick class: all nine classes are available for selection, Random class: the class will be selected at random.

hoverMenu.name: Help screen
hoverMenu.info: Click on this button to open the help screen.

hoverMenu.name: Close settings
hoverMenu.info: Use the close button underneath the application close button to exit the settings screen and return to the draft screen.

tab.name: Drop rates
tab.about: This screen allows you to change the tier scores and weights of cards (the weight represents how likely it is that a card will appear in the draft).

hoverMenu.name: Column values
hoverMenu.info: Use these text boxes to input desired values for the column beneath.

hoverMenu.name: Ranges
hoverMenu.info: Use this textbox to set custom draft ranges that will get modified by the column values.

hoverMenu.name: Update columns
hoverMenu.info: Click this button to apply the values from the top columns to all the values beneath them. If a range is set, only the text boxes corresponding to the range get modified.

hoverMenu.name: Individual drop rates
hoverMenu.info: Change the values in the text boxes to modify individual drop rates.

hoverMenu.name: Draft number
hoverMenu.info: These numbers represent the number of the draft.

hoverMenu.name: Save/load
hoverMenu.info: Use these buttons to save or load drop rates.

hoverMenu.name: Help screen
hoverMenu.info: Click on this button to open the help screen.

hoverMenu.name: Close drop rates
hoverMenu.info: Use the close button underneath the application close button to exit the drop rates screen and return to the draft screen.

tab.name: Card list
tab.about: This screen allows you to change the tier scores and weights of cards (the weight represents how likely it is that a card will appear in the draft).

hoverMenu.name: Filter categories
hoverMenu.info: Click on a filter category name to select all its filters or CTRL+click it to invert the selection of its filters.

hoverMenu.name: Filter behavior
hoverMenu.info: Click on a filter value to enable it if it is disabled or disable it if it is enabled. CTRL+click a filter value to select it and deselect all other filters of the same type.

hoverMenu.name: Special set filters
hoverMenu.info: The buttons beneath the set filters can be clicked to select standard sets, wild only sets or three sets and an adventure at random (the reward set is not considered a full set).

hoverMenu.name: Value filters
hoverMenu.info: The cost, weight and tier score filters can be used by adding values in their corresponding boxes. Some examples: "2" (value is equal to 2), "3-" (value is less or equal to 3), "4+" (value is greater or equal to 4), "5-8" (value is greater or equal to 5 and less or equal to 8).

hoverMenu.name: Reset filters
hoverMenu.info: The reset button sets all the filters to their default values.

hoverMenu.name: Filter cards
hoverMenu.info: The filter button displays the cards that belong to the currently selected filters.

hoverMenu.name: Input search term
hoverMenu.info: Use the text input to enter a search term. Only cards whose names contain the search term will be shown when a search is performed.

hoverMenu.name: Search cards
hoverMenu.info: The search button has a similar function to the filter button, but it also checks that the filtered cards match the search query.

hoverMenu.name: Reset card values
hoverMenu.info: The reset columns resets the cards being currently displayed to their default values.

hoverMenu.name: Modify multiple cards
hoverMenu.info: The update columns button applies the values in the input fields to the right to all the currently selected cards.

hoverMenu.name: Modify individual values
hoverMenu.info: You can also change individual values of tier scores or weights.

hoverMenu.name: Save and load
hoverMenu.info: The save and load buttons can be used to save and load tier lists.

hoverMenu.name: Tier score icons
hoverMenu.info: The tier score values appearing beneath these icons belong to the class represented by the icon.

hoverMenu.name: Scroll card list
hoverMenu.info: The card list can be scrolled by using the scrollwheel or by dragging the scrollbar.

hoverMenu.name: Help screen
hoverMenu.info: Click on this button to open the help screen.

hoverMenu.name: Close card list
hoverMenu.info: Use the close button underneath the application close button to exit the card list and return to the draft screen.

tab.name: Save/load
tab.about: This screen is used to save and load tier lists and drop chances.

hoverMenu.name: Input filename
hoverMenu.info: Typing in the input field updates the file list to show the files that partially match the input with black text at the top and the ones that do not match it at the bottom with grey text.

hoverMenu.name: Filename match
hoverMenu.info: If a file matches the input exactly it is shown with green text for loading (to signify that the file exists)and red text for saving (to signify that the file already exists and will get overwritten).

hoverMenu.name: File click
hoverMenu.info: Clicking on any of the filenames will put its value in the input field.

hoverMenu.name: Save/load
hoverMenu.info: Pressing enter or clicking on the button to the right will attempt to save/load the file that has the same name as the input field.

hoverMenu.name: Open folder
hoverMenu.info: Click this button to open the folder where the drop rates/tier scores are stored.

hoverMenu.name: Screen action
hoverMenu.info: The text at the top of the screen shows what action will be performed (quot;Save tier listquot; etc.).

hoverMenu.name: Help screen
hoverMenu.info: Click on this button to open the help screen.

hoverMenu.name: Close save/load
hoverMenu.info: Use the close button underneath the application close button to exit the save/load screen and return to the previous screen.
